project.name: PHPaibot
project.description: A proactive PHP chatbot that simulates human-like thinking by generating thoughts, maintaining memory, and evolving personality
project.status: PoC Complete - Core conversation loop working

architecture.overview: Hybrid push/pull chat system. Uses a remote Ollama endpoint for LLM and embeddings. Vector memory is simulated with a local JSON file and in-memory cosine similarity search. Proactive thoughts are pushed via WebSockets.

conversationalLoop.description: Fast, reactive chat system using a local JSON file for RAG.
conversationalLoop.implementation: Node.js backend handles chat requests, retrieves context, and calls a remote LLM.

cognitiveLoop.description: Background 'thinker' process that generates proactive thoughts.
cognitiveLoop.implementation: Currently simulated with a hardcoded list of questions pushed via WebSocket on a timer.

memorySystem.description: Vector memory simulated by a local JSON file.
memorySystem.implementation: A `db.json` file stores conversation vectors. Context retrieval is done via an in-memory cosine similarity search.

infrastructureComponents.description: Docker-based infrastructure for web and API servers.

phases.name: Infrastructure Setup & Core Conversational Loop
phases.description: Deploy infrastructure and implement basic chat functionality with memory.

tasks.name: Implement Node.js backend with API and WebSocket server
Externalize AI models to remote Ollama endpoint
Replace Qdrant with local JSON file vector store
Implement conversational memory with context retrieval
Implement idle timer for proactive thoughts

deliverables: Working chatbot with contextual memory and proactive engagement.

phases.name: The Thinker

tasks.name: Replace hardcoded thought list with dynamic LLM-based generation
Create N8N workflows for RSS feed processing (or similar external data source)
Feed external data into the thought generation process

deliverables: Chatbot that initiates conversations based on new information.

phases.name: Personality & Evolution

tasks.name: Add Profile store for user/bot personality traits
Create feedback loops for continuous learning

deliverables: Chatbot that adapts and develops personality.

nextSteps: Replace the hardcoded `proactiveThoughts` array in `server.js` with a dynamic process.
This could involve a new function that calls the LLM with a prompt like 'Generate a curious question to start a conversation'.
Integrate external data sources (like news APIs or RSS feeds) to give Aura topics to think about.
